This project contains version 2.11 of the Mongoose web server project, as 
found at http://code.google.com/p/mongoose.

It contains the final release code for version 2.11 as of 04-Oct-2010
(revision fa6b34b247). It contains an additional change to fix Mongoose
issue 187 (http://code.google.com/p/mongoose/issues/detail?id=187) to
improve stability when running a debug build.
